# Adding Online Booking To Your Website

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/adding-online-booking-to-your-website/

## Category
13 Online Booking

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
ONLINE BOOKING
Adding Online Booking to Your Website

After enabling online booking, you can add online booking to your website.

By integrating online booking with your website, your online booking will open in an overlay so clients can book appointments without leaving your website.

The Mangomint team is available to complete your online booking integration for you. If you would like to complete the integration yourself, follow the steps in this article, or follow the steps in one of the following articles for popular website builders:

Adding Online Booking to a Shopify Website

Adding Online Booking to a Squarespace Website

Adding Online Booking to a Wix Website

Adding Online Booking to a WordPress Website

Note: 

If your website builder does not support the online booking integration, you can still add your online booking link to your website. When clients click the link, the online booking widget will open in a separate browser tab instead of in an overlay.

Link copied
Integrating online booking with your website

To integrate online booking with your website, open the Settings app. Go to Online Booking > Setup & Integration and copy your script tag.

Paste the script tag in the HTML header section of your website.

Once you’ve added the script tag to the HTML header section of your website, copy your online booking link and use it as the URL for any booking buttons/links on your website to complete the integration.

Learn more about online booking from the client’s perspective, including how clients can book appointments through online booking.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
